WRITING.TITLE: [PC] [H] Certified Toppers [W] Offers (Don't Add)
WRITING.TEXT: Offers here first. Interested in crate items (except rare and very decals), painted toppers and wheels (interest depends on the colour and topper/wheel. Like pirates hat and little bow, no trahere or lowriders), keys, job lot of crates (C1 and C3) Not interest in non painted uncommons, non painted rare toppers or non painted rare wheels. Definitely not interest in rare decals or very rare boosts (toon smoke, frostbite etc.) What I have: Bobby Helmet (Sniper) Brodie Helmet (Paragon) Brodie Helmet (Scorer) Captain's Hat (Sweeper) Captain's Hat (Tactician) Chainsaw (Turtle) Chef's Hat (Sweeper) Devil Horns (Tactician) Fez (Sweeper) Fire Helmet (Goalkeeper) Graduation Cap (Juggler) Hard Hat (Show-Off) Mariachi Hat (Turtle) Mouse Trap (Sniper) Party Hat (Juggler) Propellerhead (Juggler) Rhino Horns (Aviator) Royal Crown (Paragon) Royal Crown (Scorer) Trucker Hat (Striker) Unicorn (Guardian) Witch's Hat (Scorer)
EmulsionMonkey Steam Also happened to a teamate who doesn't have a reddit account Fish_Goes_Moo Steam

WRITING.TITLE: Senran Kagura EV Phone Wallpapers, Uncompressed Versions?
WRITING.TEXT: @steve3939 posted a link to imgur with all the EV promotional phone wallpapers. Problem is they have been compressed. Look on Hikage and homura's hair for example, you can see compression artifacts. The versions on Yande have none of these artifacts and are around 1.9mb+ each. However a few are missing. Does anyone have or know where I can get the ones missing from Yande? Missing: Mirai in black Ryona Murakamo Ryobi smile version Murasaki Haruka Katsuragi Ryoki (Haruka and Katsuragi are the main two I want.)

Thanks a lot. Imgur compressed them a fair bit. The originals are 1.9mb+, the ones on imgur are under 400kb. They all have compression artifacts on imgur. . Do you have the phone and desktop wallpapers for Rin and Daidouji that Marvelous Europe tweeted about back in 16? ( https://twitter.com/marvelous_games/status/724524844029775872?lang=en ) Also do you have all the desktop wallpapers (1080p) that was post on the site? I missed all of what ME posted and the link in that tweet no longer works.
Easy vote, Miyabi.
Having to choose between Hikage and Haruka. Hikage edges it though, so voted for her.

WRITING.TITLE: SK New Link Wallpaper
WRITING.TEXT: There is a New Link wallpaper for PC, iOS and Andriod on the official Japanese website. Get them here https://www.hpgames.jp/shinomas/wallpaper.php

WRITING.TITLE: 3 Peach Beach Splash Wallpapers
WRITING.TEXT: Incase some don't know, there are 3 PBS wallpapers up on the US site. Can get them here http://peachbeachsplash.com/newtube.html One is the same image that's on the JP site, except with a slightly different crop. No 1440 version like th JP site though.
Add Manpukumaru.

WRITING.TITLE: Burst Re:Newal Wallpapers
WRITING.TEXT: On the offical Japanese site they now have desktop(1440) and phone wallpapers. There's also some icons and twitter banners. https://senrankagura.marv.jp/series/burst_re/special/nyunyu_kit.html Under each set is a link for a zip file. Save getting each image separate.

WRITING.TITLE: Did Anyone Manage To Get These New Link Wallpapers?
WRITING.TEXT: They released for a limited time only a set of wallpapers for 20 of the girls. Desktop and Smartphone. Was only about for a limited time (29/11/17-04/01/18). I missed them and was hoping someone here managed to get them and could upload them, preferably in a zip or rar file. Looking for the original files from the site, not files that have been compressed or resized. These are the ones I'm talking about https://www.hpgames.jp/shinomas/release_campaign.php Scroll down and you will see them.

Although the speed is really really slow, I could just leave it downloading while doing something else. Problem is the download always fails. Gets about 5mb or so and stops. Thanks for the link though.

Here's a full body version of [Ikaruga](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-P6rHdVRQ3Dc/WmkrTGHxQJI/AAAAAAAAAAU/5XNlbrx7I2Ep7nPjP1AiyjoYJv78NkC2QCEwYBhgL/s1600/201801_%25E3%2582%25A8%25E3%2583%25AA%25E3%2582%25A2%25E3%2583%2590%25E3%2583%2588%25E3%2583%25AB_LR.jpg). Clothes are damaged in this one. (from the NewWave blog)

Wouldn't mind having the option to use the salvage to buy the armour/weapon stats I want.(from all the stats available in game for that tier). Looking for a certain stat for a weapon part and it takes an age to get. I'm sure at times the game just mocks you and gives you everything but the stat you want.

WRITING.TITLE: New Link Character Wallpapers.
WRITING.TEXT: Just over a week ago I asked if anyone managed to get the wallpapers from here https://www.hpgames.jp/shinomas/release_campaign.php . steve3939 did post a link but it was slow and the download would fail after a few minutes. Anyway I manage to get all the wallpapers as they are still on hpgames servers, just not linked on the main web site. If you view image info on one of the thumbs, copy the link, paste it into you browers address bar and change /thumb/ to /wp/ you will get the wall paper. Did a test upload on imgur, but the images get compressed(1.97mb file down to 350kb). So won't bother there. So instead I have created a list on pastebin with the direct links to the wallpapers on hpgames servers. 23 desktop wallpapers and 23 mobile wallpapers https://pastebin.com/1G6R2DRW Enjoy.

WRITING.TITLE: More Burst Re:Newal Wallpapers
WRITING.TEXT: They have added some more wallpapers and icons to the official Burst Re:Newal website.They have now added the girls from Gessen and Hebijo. https://senrankagura.marv.jp/series/burst_re/special/nyunyu_kit.html

Here is the png of the promotional image. It's the image used on the website. Has a transparent background, so you can put the image on any background you want. Just have to erase the text. [Promotional Image](https://senrankagura.marv.jp/series/burst_re/img/special/donki/donki.png)
Source - New Wave Blog

WRITING.TITLE: Made This Wallpaper Using The Burst Re:Newal Promo DLC

WRITING.TEXT: Thought I would share this. Made it using [this](https://senrankagura.marv.jp/series/burst_re/img/special/donki/donki.png) image. Imgur hasn't compressed it. Correct size 934KB. Also posted on /r/animewallpaper

WRITING.TITLE: flair: Desktop Senran Kagura Burst Re:Newal Promo DLC Wallpaper (1920x1080)

WRITING.TEXT: Made this. Image [Source](https://senrankagura.marv.jp/series/burst_re/img/special/donki/donki.png) Imgur hasn't compressed it. Correct size 934KB. Posted on /r/senrankagura as awell.
Source - New Wave Blog
Source - New Wave Blog. Think they have made a typo in the file name. I assume the file name was meant to be 201802 and not 201803.
Need to get an updated map. News to me that Aficia and the middle east are part of Europe.

As you don't need to pay a sub to play online I wonder if the multiplayer will be dead on the PC as well. Tried the PS4 online when they had a free to play weekend an it was like a wasteland. Hopefully the PC version doesn't suffer with the same framerate porblems as the PS4.

You don't say. It's obvious. It was a dig at Africa and the middle east being put on EU servers. Other regions get there own servers yet Europe has to take everyone that's left over. Going to have players from those regions with 150+ ping ruining the experiance for EU players.
The art works from Burst Re:Newal. (except the Renka image)
Easy vote. Haruka.

Hope they release these new bikinis for the PC version.
Want Re:Newal on the PC as it will run better, but the PS4 version will probably get a physically CE. So depending on what items a CE version comes with I might have to get that as well.

WRITING.TITLE: Chitose - Doki Doki Experience Event Image (Read First Comment)

WRITING.TEXT: I know HelenaHarper posted this image a few days ago but that image had clearly visible compression issues. This version is from the [New Wave Blog](https://kaguranw.blogspot.com/2018/04/blog-post_23.html) and doesn't have the compression issues. I would have posted sooner but the official blog can be a bit slow to update.
Only a card version was on the offical blog and a few other Japanese game news sites. However a non card version was posted on game news site Game Social Info.
Hikage and Ikaruga looking good as always, but the Hikage image is just WOW.
Source - [New Wave Blog](https://kaguranw.blogspot.com/2018/05/blog-post.html). This is the version from the official blog.
Original image. Hasn't been upscaled. Source - [New Wave Blog](https://kaguranw.blogspot.com/2018/05/blog-post_15.html)
Snap. Just posted this as well. I posted the original though and not an upscale.

That's up to you. Why not just have both. I prefer to have the original image, especially when the original isn't even that small(this one is 1000 #215; 1592). Problem with the upscales is they tend to have some detail loss. Normally because dnr has been used when using waifu2x, even when it's not needed. An example of detail loss. Look at this image and look at the upscaled version androidlolita posted. Look at the curtain, you can see detail loss.
Any screen shots of all the event weapons?
